## sendTelegramMessage variable

Send a text message to a Telegram chat, using the Telegram API.

https://core.telegram.org/bots/api\#sendmessage

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
send: ({ chat_id, text, token }: Config, options?: Options | undefined) => Promise<{
    delivered: boolean;
    message: string;
    delivered_at?: undefined;
} | {
    delivered: boolean;
    delivered_at: string;
    message: string;
}>
```
